About

Innovative

As a recent graduate with a Master's in Computer Science, I have conducted research in distributed/decentralized systems and developed creative solutions across various projects. My work demonstrates my ability to tackle complex problems and innovate within diverse technological domains.

Driven

My academic journey is marked by a strong commitment to excellence, evidenced by graduating summa cum laude and receiving the Outstanding Student of the Year award twice. I continuously strive to expand my knowledge and skills through post-graduate research and hands-on projects.

Analytical

With expertise in C, C++, and Python, I excel in analyzing and improving complex systems. My research background and experience in software development demonstrate my ability to critically evaluate and enhance technological solutions, making me versatile and adaptable to roles across the software development stack.
